verses.1: Kote tungah hi loin, Topa aw, kote tungah hi loin, na itna kip le na thumanna hangin nangma tungah minthanna om tahen.
verses.2: Bang hangin minam dangte in, “Amauteʼ Pasian koi ah om ahi hiam?” ci laizang ding ahi uh hiam?
verses.3: Vantungah eiteʼ Pasian om a, ama ut peuhpeuh a hih hi.
verses.4: Amauʼ milimte pen ngun le kham hi lel a, mihingteʼ khut tawh a kibawl ahi hi.
verses.5: Amaute in kam nei napi-in pau thei lo uh a, mit nei napi-in khua mu thei lo uh hi.
verses.6: Amaute in bil nei napi-in khua za lo uh a, nak nei napi-in a nam thei lo uh hi.
verses.7: Amaute in khut nei napi-in lawng thei lo uh a, khe nei napi-in pai thei lo uh hi. Amaute in aw gingsak thei lo uh hi.
verses.8: Tuate a bawlte le tuate a muangte khempeuh pen tuate mah tawh kibang uh hi.
verses.9: Israel-te aw, Topa muang un. Amah pen note hong huhpa le hong hupa ahi hi.
verses.10: Aaron innkuante aw, Topa muang un. Amah pen note hong huhpa le hong hupa ahi hi.
verses.11: Topa a zahtakte aw, Topa muang un. Amah pen note hong huhpa le hong hupa ahi hi.
verses.12: Topa in eite hong phawk a, thupha hong pia ding hi. Amah in Israel mite, thupha hong pia dinga, amah in Aaron innkuante thupha hong pia ding hi.
verses.13: Amah in Topa a zahtakte a lian a neu-in thupha hong pia ding hi.
verses.14: Topa in note le na tate uh hong pungsak tahen.
verses.15: Vanlelei a bawl Topa in note thupha hong pia tahen.
verses.16: Vantung pen Topa aʼ hi a, ahih hangin leitung pen mihingte tungah hong pia khin hi.
verses.17: Misite ahi a, gamdaihna sungah a pai peuhpeuhte in ahi zongin Topa phat lo uh hi.
verses.18: Ahih hangin eite in tu a kipanin a tawntungin Topa i phat ngitnget ding hi. Topa phat un.
